Description: ESP Eclipse 2011 left handed. Your search is over! This one is one-of-a-kind custom ordered with a beautiful AAA flame maple top, ebony fretboard, "flag" inlays. Look at the pictures and see it for yourself! Frets are in excellent condition - shiny and aligned, with negligible wear. This is a real ESP guitar. Includes owner's manual and other case candies.
